# ElPuas Digital Crafts

> [EN] A boutique web development studio (WordPress, WooCommerce, Astro) combining creativity, technical support, and modern technologies for micro‑businesses, agencies, and global brands.  
> [ES] Boutique de desarrollo web (WordPress, WooCommerce, Astro) que combina creatividad, soporte técnico y tecnologías modernas para microempresas, agencias y marcas globales.  
> [IT] Studio di sviluppo web boutique (WordPress, WooCommerce, Astro) che unisce creatività, supporto tecnico e tecnologie moderne per microimprese, agenzie e marchi internazionali.

## Services / Servicios / Servizi
- https://elpuas.dev/en/services  
  [EN] Clear description of key services: WordPress, e-commerce, support, and white-label.  
  [ES] Descripción clara de servicios clave: WordPress, e-commerce, soporte y desarrollo white-label.  
  [IT] Descrizione chiara dei servizi principali: WordPress, e-commerce, supporto e servizi white-label.

## Portfolio / Portafolio / Portfolio

  [EN] Project showcase with real examples and success stories.  
  [ES] Portafolio de proyectos con ejemplos reales y casos de éxito.  
  [IT] Portfolio con esempi reali e storie di successo.
